theresa:TheBabel.NAME: MI
DESCRIPTIONS: You have changed your destiny. NL As the blade falls from the last assassin's hand，The once-white floor was covered in blood. Everything is in dim……Which path will the Sarkaz's future take now?
You have faced your doom. NL As the blades from Deathveil Assassin pierce your body，the despicable assassination finally comes to an end.
The Tower of Babel is still there. Hope still exists. NL But even if the Tower of Babel falls... Our future may not fade away either.
